refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Instances of the GDBusMethodInvocation class are used when handling D-Bus method calls. It provides a way to asynchronously return results and errors.

The normal way to obtain a GDBusMethodInvocation object is to receive it as an argument to the handle_method_call() function in a GDBusInterfaceVTable that was passed to g_dbus_connection_register_object().

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_get_sender ()
refsect2.para: Gets the bus name that invoked the method.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A string. Do not free, it is owned by invocation .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_get_object_path ()
refsect2.para: Gets the object path the method was invoked on.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A string. Do not free, it is owned by invocation .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_get_interface_name ()
refsect2.para: Gets the name of the D-Bus interface the method was invoked on.

If this method call is a property Get, Set or GetAll call that has been redirected to the method call handler then "org.freedesktop.DBus.Properties" will be returned. See GDBusInterfaceVTable for more information.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A string. Do not free, it is owned by invocation .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_get_method_name ()
refsect2.para: Gets the name of the method that was invoked.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A string. Do not free, it is owned by invocation .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_get_method_info ()
refsect2.para: Gets information about the method call, if any.

If this method invocation is a property Get, Set or GetAll call that has been redirected to the method call handler then NULL will be returned. See g_dbus_method_invocation_get_property_info() and GDBusInterfaceVTable for more information.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GDBusMethodInfo or NULL. Do not free, it is owned by invocation .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_get_property_info ()
refsect2.para: Gets information about the property that this method call is for, if any.

This will only be set in the case of an invocation in response to a property Get or Set call that has been directed to the method call handler for an object on account of its property_get() or property_set() vtable pointers being unset.
See GDBusInterfaceVTable for more information.
If the call was GetAll, NULL will be returned.
Since: 2.38

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_get_connection ()
refsect2.para: Gets the GDBusConnection the method was invoked on.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GDBusConnection. Do not free, it is owned by invocation .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_get_message ()
refsect2.para: Gets the GDBusMessage for the method invocation. This is useful if you need to use low-level protocol features, such as UNIX file descriptor passing, that cannot be properly expressed in the GVariant API.
See this server and client for an example of how to use this low-level API to send and receive UNIX file descriptors.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: GDBusMessage. Do not free, it is owned by invocation .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_get_parameters ()
refsect2.para: Gets the parameters of the method invocation. If there are no input parameters then this will return a GVariant with 0 children rather than NULL.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GVariant tuple. Do not unref this because it is owned by invocation .

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_get_user_data ()
refsect2.para: Gets the user_data gpointer passed to g_dbus_connection_register_object().
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_return_value ()
refsect2.para: Finishes handling a D-Bus method call by returning parameters . If the parameters GVariant is floating, it is consumed.

It is an error if parameters is not of the right format: it must be a tuple containing the out-parameters of the D-Bus method. Even if the method has a single out-parameter, it must be contained in a tuple. If the method has no out-parameters, parameters may be NULL or an empty tuple.
This method will take ownership of invocation . See GDBusInterfaceVTable for more information about the ownership of invocation .

Since 2.48, if the method call requested for a reply not to be sent then this call will sink parameters and free invocation , but otherwise do nothing (as per the recommendations of the D-Bus specification).

entry.para: A GVariant tuple with out parameters for the method or NULL if not passing any parameters.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_return_error ()
refsect2.para: Finishes handling a D-Bus method call by returning an error.

See g_dbus_error_encode_gerror() for details about what error name will be returned on the wire. In a nutshell, if the given error is registered using g_dbus_error_register_error() the name given during registration is used. Otherwise, a name of the form org.gtk.GDBus.UnmappedGError.Quark... is used. This provides transparent mapping of GError between applications using GDBus.
If you are writing an application intended to be portable, always register errors with g_dbus_error_register_error() or use g_dbus_method_invocation_return_dbus_error().
This method will take ownership of invocation . See GDBusInterfaceVTable for more information about the ownership of invocation .
Since 2.48, if the method call requested for a reply not to be sent then this call will free invocation but otherwise do nothing (as per the recommendations of the D-Bus specification).

entry.para: A GQuark for the GError error domain.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_return_error_valist ()
refsect2.programlisting: void g_dbus_method_invocation_return_error_valist (GDBusMethodInvocation *invocation, GQuark domain, gint code, const gchar *format, va_list var_args);
refsect2.para: Like g_dbus_method_invocation_return_error() but intended for language bindings.
This method will take ownership of invocation . See GDBusInterfaceVTable for more information about the ownership of invocation .

entry.para: A GQuark for the GError error domain.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_return_error_literal ()
refsect2.programlisting: void g_dbus_method_invocation_return_error_literal (GDBusMethodInvocation *invocation, GQuark domain, gint code, const gchar *message);
refsect2.para: Like g_dbus_method_invocation_return_error() but without printf()-style formatting.
This method will take ownership of invocation . See GDBusInterfaceVTable for more information about the ownership of invocation .

entry.para: A GQuark for the GError error domain.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_return_gerror ()
refsect2.para: Like g_dbus_method_invocation_return_error() but takes a GError instead of the error domain, error code and message.
This method will take ownership of invocation . See GDBusInterfaceVTable for more information about the ownership of invocation .
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_return_dbus_error ()
refsect2.para: Finishes handling a D-Bus method call by returning an error.
This method will take ownership of invocation . See GDBusInterfaceVTable for more information about the ownership of invocation .
Since: 2.26

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_take_error ()
refsect2.para: Like g_dbus_method_invocation_return_gerror() but takes ownership of error so the caller does not need to free it.
This method will take ownership of invocation . See GDBusInterfaceVTable for more information about the ownership of invocation .
Since: 2.30

refsect2.title: g_dbus_method_invocation_return_value_with_unix_fd_list ()
refsect2.para: Like g_dbus_method_invocation_return_value() but also takes a GUnixFDList.
This method is only available on UNIX.
This method will take ownership of invocation . See GDBusInterfaceVTable for more information about the ownership of invocation .

entry.para: A GVariant tuple with out parameters for the method or NULL if not passing any parameters.

refsect2.para: Since: 2.30

refsect2.title: GDBusMethodInvocation
refsect2.para: The GDBusMethodInvocation structure contains only private data and should only be accessed using the provided API.
Since: 2.26
